original_text: And Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest shall be chief over the chief of the Levites, and have the oversight of them that keep the charge of the sanctuary.
korean_text: 제사장 아론의 아들 엘르아살은 레위인의 지휘관들의 어른이 되고 또 성소를 맡을 자를 통할할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest
shall be chief over the chief of the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 레위인의 두령 위에 두령이 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and have the oversight of them
that keep the charge of the sanctuary
